languages.text: "Ты боишься. Ты отказываешься испытывать, что значит быть на краю. Что значит познание боли. Как ты выйдешь за свои убогие рамки, когда цепляешься за них изо всех сил?"

"You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"
languages.original_text: "Ты боишься. Ты отказываешься испытывать, что значит быть на краю. Что значит познание боли. Как ты выйдешь за свои убогие рамки, когда цепляешься за них изо всех сил?"

traits.locale_text: "You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

"You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

"You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

"You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

languages.text: “你满心恐惧。你拒绝体会生死边缘的感悟，拒绝了解痛苦的真谛。既然你死死地抓着已有的一切，不肯放手，那你又该如何超越你那可悲的极限呢？”
languages.original_text: "You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

traits.locale_text: “你满心恐惧。你拒绝体会生死边缘的感悟，拒绝了解痛苦的真谛。既然你死死地抓着已有的一切，不肯放手，那你又该如何超越你那可悲的极限呢？”

languages.text: 「お前は恐れてるんだ。瀬戸際を経験することの意味を、痛みを知ることの意味を拒否している。思い切りしがみついている状態で、どうやって己の哀れな限界を超えることができる？」
languages.original_text: "You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は恐れてるんだ。瀬戸際を経験することの意味を、痛みを知ることの意味を拒否している。思い切りしがみついている状態で、どうやって己の哀れな限界を超えることができる？」

languages.text: «Tienes miedo. Te niegas a experimentar lo que significa estar al límite. Lo que implica conocer el dolor. ¿Cómo vas a aventurarte más allá de tus patéticas limitaciones si te aferras a ellas con todas tus fuerzas?».
languages.original_text: "You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

traits.locale_text: «Tienes miedo. Te niegas a experimentar lo que significa estar al límite. Lo que implica conocer el dolor. ¿Cómo vas a aventurarte más allá de tus patéticas limitaciones si te aferras a ellas con todas tus fuerzas?».

languages.text: « Vous avez peur. Trop pour oser vous aventurer sur le fil du rasoir et expérimenter la vraie souffrance. Comment pourriez-vous espérer vous affranchir de vos limites étriquées alors que vous vous y raccrochez de toutes vos forces ? »
languages.original_text: "You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez peur. Trop pour oser vous aventurer sur le fil du rasoir et expérimenter la vraie souffrance. Comment pourriez-vous espérer vous affranchir de vos limites étriquées alors que vous vous y raccrochez de toutes vos forces ? »

languages.text: "Ihr habt Angst. Ihr verweigert Euch zu erfahren, was es bedeutet, Eure Grenzen zu verschieben. Was es bedeutet, Schmerz zu erfahren. Wie wollt Ihr Euch jemals über Eure erbärmlichen Grenzen hinauswagen, wenn Ihr Euch lieber mit aller Kraft an sie klammert?"
languages.original_text: "You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Angst. Ihr verweigert Euch zu erfahren, was es bedeutet, Eure Grenzen zu verschieben. Was es bedeutet, Schmerz zu erfahren. Wie wollt Ihr Euch jemals über Eure erbärmlichen Grenzen hinauswagen, wenn Ihr Euch lieber mit aller Kraft an sie klammert?"

languages.text: "Korkuyorsun. Sınırda yaşamanın ne olduğunu, acıyı tanımanın ne olduğunu deneyimlemeyi reddediyorsun. Tüm kudretinle bunlara tutunurken acınası sınırlarının ötesini nasıl keşfe çıkacaksın?"
languages.original_text: "You are afraid. You refuse to experience what it means to be on the edge. What it means to know pain. How will you ever venture beyond your pathetic limits when you cling to them with all your might?"

traits.locale_text: "Korkuyorsun. Sınırda yaşamanın ne olduğunu, acıyı tanımanın ne olduğunu deneyimlemeyi reddediyorsun. Tüm kudretinle bunlara tutunurken acınası sınırlarının ötesini nasıl keşfe çıkacaksın?"
